about_the_game:
Explore and conquer a 100-floor roguelite dungeon in this cute but challenging card-battler RPG. Open card packs, change your class, customize your deck, equip accessories, and take on quests from quirky NPCs as you experience a charming story and engage in strategic turn-based battles against unique enemies and bosses.

Strategic card-battler combat

  • Face down a variety of enemies and challenging bosses, each with their own unique behaviors and mechanics.

  • Purchase card packs with in-game gold, then arrange your deck. The cards you choose will determine your class; Each comes with their own unique perk!

  • Customize your cards to your liking! Each card can be buffed up to three times with 15 different traits.

  • Equip powerful accessories that complement your unique playstyle.

Explore and survive a 100-floor roguelite dungeon

  • Each room is procedurally generated and changes with every visit!

  • Scour rooms for treasure chests, breakables, and hidden gold and health drops. The items you find can be used for crafting, customizing, or completing quests.

Experience a charming story and quirky characters

  • Help Aria find her older sister who has mysteriously vanished.

  • Assist the locals in rebuilding and improving the town by taking on quests that feature humorous dialog.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
